assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.description: Chat with AI for medical assistance and guidance
assistant.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI medical assistant powered by advanced language models. I can help you with medical information, research, symptom analysis, and general health guidance. How can I assist you today?
assistant.error: Sorry, there was an error processing your request. Please try again.
assistant.noMessages: Start a conversation with the AI assistant
assistant.aiPrompt: You are a helpful AI medical assistant. The user is asking
assistant.aiPromptInstruction: Please provide a helpful, informative response. If this is a medical question, provide general information while reminding them to consult healthcare professionals for specific medical advice.
assistant.fallbackResponse: I apologize, but I'm having trouble processing your request right now. Please try again in a moment, or contact support if the issue persists.
assistant.errorResponse: I encountered an error while processing your request. Please try again or contact support if the issue continues.
assistant.headerDescription: Powered by advanced medical AI for healthcare professionals
assistant.symptomCheckExample: I have a headache, what could be the cause?
assistant.treatmentInfoExample: What are the latest treatments for diabetes?
assistant.lifestyleTipsExample: How to manage high blood pressure naturally?
assistant.medicationInfoExample: What are the common side effects of antibiotics?
assistant.disclaimerText: This AI assistant provides general medical information and should not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with qualified healthcare providers for medical concerns.

drugInteraction.title: AI Drug Interaction Checker
drugInteraction.description: AI-powered drug interaction analysis, side effects, and safety recommendations
drugInteraction.patientSelectionRequiredDesc: Please select a patient in the Patient Profile tab before adding medications. Patient information is required for accurate drug interaction analysis.
drugInteraction.noMedicationsAdded: No medications added yet. Use the "Quick Add" buttons or add custom medications above.
drugInteraction.selectPatientDesc: Select a patient to automatically populate their information for more accurate drug interaction analysis

appointmentOptimizer.patientInfoEditableDesc: You can edit the patient information below. Changes will be used for appointment optimization but won't affect the original patient record.
appointmentOptimizer.allergiesPlaceholder: Known allergies to medications, foods, or environmental factors...
appointmentOptimizer.patientSelectionRequiredDesc: Please select a patient above to enable appointment optimization. Patient information is required for accurate scheduling recommendations.

riskAssessment.title: AI Patient Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.description: AI-powered patient risk scoring, predictive analytics, and preventive care recommendations
riskAssessment.useAssessmentFormDesc: Use the assessment form below to analyze patient risk factors
riskAssessment.enterPatientInfoDesc: Enter patient information to get instant risk analysis
riskAssessment.selectPatientDesc: Select a patient to automatically populate their information for more accurate risk assessment
riskAssessment.patientSelectionRequiredDesc: Please select a patient above to enable risk assessment. Patient information is required for accurate analysis.
riskAssessment.highRiskPredictionDesc: Patient shows high probability of cardiovascular events in next 5 years
riskAssessment.mediumRiskPredictionDesc: Moderate risk of developing diabetes in next 3 years
riskAssessment.lowRiskPredictionDesc: Low risk of major health complications
riskAssessment.implementLifestyleModifications: Implement lifestyle modifications to reduce cardiovascular risk
riskAssessment.regularMonitoring: Regular monitoring of blood pressure and cholesterol
riskAssessment.considerPreventiveMedications: Consider preventive medications based on risk profile

healthTrends.title: AI Health Trend Analysis
healthTrends.description: AI-powered health trend detection, predictive analytics, and population health insights
healthTrends.diabetesIncreaseDesc: 15% increase in Type 2 diabetes cases in the last 3 months
healthTrends.fluPatternDesc: Expected increase in respiratory infections based on historical data
healthTrends.hypertensionIncreaseDesc: Hypertension cases showing 25% increase in patients under 40
healthTrends.mentalHealthIncreaseDesc: Mental health consultations increasing by 18% monthly
healthTrends.preventiveCareIncreaseDesc: Preventive care visits increased by 32% this quarter
healthTrends.diabetesIncreasePrediction: Diabetes cases expected to increase by 40% in next 6 months
healthTrends.cardiovascularIncreasePrediction: Cardiovascular events likely to increase by 22% in winter months
healthTrends.preventiveCareAdoptionPrediction: Preventive care adoption expected to continue upward trend
healthTrends.mlModelsTrained: Machine learning models trained on 5 years of patient data
healthTrends.accuracyImproved: Predictive accuracy improved by 23% with latest AI models
healthTrends.realTimeAnalysis: Real-time trend analysis with 15-minute update intervals
healthTrends.urbanAreasDesc: Higher rates of stress-related conditions, better access to preventive care
healthTrends.suburbanAreasDesc: Balanced health patterns, moderate access to healthcare services
healthTrends.ruralAreasDesc: Higher chronic disease rates, limited access to specialized care

voiceInput.voiceWillBeRecorded: Your voice will be recorded and processed by AI for medical documentation.
